TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdatePanelDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 为可视化设计器中的 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关此类的详细信息，请参阅类文档。For more information about this class, see class documentation.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

related.span: 演练： 创建基本的控件设计器的 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]在内部构建的新实例类创建关联时控件或该控件在设计图面上的副本。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

param.span: 关联控件的控件设计器区域。

span.span: The control designer regions for the associated control.

summary.span: 返回用于显示 控件的 HTML 标记，并使用当前的控件设计器区域填充集合。

span.span: Returns the HTML markup that is used to display the control, and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.

returns.span: 关联控件（包括所有控件设计器区域）的设计时 HTML 标记。

span.span: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此设计器是否应使用 控件的临时副本取代与此设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy of the control to generate the design-time markup, instead of using the actual control that is associated with the designer.
Always .
